title: Hour 2: Bomani Jones Joins the Show!
description:
Bomani Jones joins the show to discuss the Cowboys super bowl chances. The Pivot Podcast Crew (Fred Taylor, Channing Crowder and Ryan Clark) take over the set to breakdown the biggest QB pivots this season. Later, Stephen A. calls Kansas City the, "ideal place" for Odell Beckham Jr. Lastly the crew debates which Florida team will go the furthest this NFL Season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
